thread.title: Criselda Cuthbert
thread.title_full: Vision Direct UK reviewed by Criselda Cuthbert

author: Criselda Cuthbert
title: Criselda Cuthbert
text: Delivery was great . I'm not quite sure about the brilliant blue contact lens. It's not the colour that I imagined. The brown one I like it. TRied the clear one and had a problem with it. Unknowingly I've lost one of the lens and thinking it got stuck on my right eye. HAd to go to optician for them to look for it as my eye was really red and sore.
